# DarkBold Theme

A pure monochrome design inspired by [Vercel](https://vercel.com/docs) â€” featuring Geist typography, tight letter-spacing, and clean minimalism.

## Usage

```tsx title="docs.config.tsx"
import { defineDocs } from "@farming-labs/docs";
import { darkbold } from "@farming-labs/theme/darkbold";

export default defineDocs({
  entry: "docs",
  theme: darkbold(),
});
```

```css title="app/global.css"
@import "tailwindcss";
@import "@farming-labs/theme/darkbold/css";
```

## Defaults

| Property      | Value             |
| ------------- | ----------------- |
| Primary       | `#000` (Black)    |
| Background    | `#fff`            |
| Border        | `#eaeaea`         |
| Border radius | Standard          |
| Content width | 768px             |
| Sidebar width | 260px             |
| Font          | Geist, Geist Mono |

## Typography

DarkBold uses the Geist font family with tighter letter-spacing for headings:

- **H1**: 2.5rem, weight 600, letter-spacing -0.06em
- **H2**: 2rem, weight 600, letter-spacing -0.04em
- **H3**: 1.5rem, weight 600, letter-spacing -0.02em

## Customizing

```tsx
theme: darkbold({
  ui: {
    colors: { primary: "#0070f3" },
    typography: {
      font: {
        h1: { size: "3rem", weight: 700 },
      },
    },
  },
}),
```
